thread.title: BRIEF-Cloud Live Technology's Share Trade To Resume, Local Court Suspends Auction Of Company Shares

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Cloud Live Technology's Share Trade To Resume, Local Court Suspends Auction Of Company Shares

organizations.name: local court suspends auction of company shares feb
reuters) - cloud live technology group co ltd

text:
Feb 5 (Reuters) - Cloud Live Technology Group Co Ltd :
* SAYS SHARE TRADE TO RESUME ON FEB 6, LOCAL COURT HAS SUSPENDED AUCTION OF 181.6 MILLION SHARES IN THE COMPANY Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/2BVy1sl Further company coverage: (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
